name: Discrete Wireless
overview:
The Discrete Wireless MARCUS GPS Fleet Tracking solution is the highest value vehicle and fleet management solution in the industry.

100% Web-based, our solution enables you to proactively manage and track your fleet in real-time while reducing operational costs and maximizing revenue. A proven fleet management solution designed for ease of use and rapid ROI and deployment can help your organization increase productivity, profitability, accurate billing and job validation. Our fleet tracking solution can also help you reduce fuel, insurance, maintenance and labor costs as well as idle time.

Because the MARCUS GPS Fleet Tracking solution is a SaaS solution, there is no software to buy or install and no additional burden or infrastructure. Customers simply login to the secure Web site to access real-time GPS fleet tracking information on their fleet from any Web-enabled device. Discrete Wireless customers rely on MARCUS Fleet Tracking for 24/7 access to the information they need to drive their business forward.

The MARCUS GPS Fleet Tracking enables you to determine metrics through daily, weekly and monthly reporting features, allowing you to get a strategic, end-to-end view of your fleet operations as you put out day-to-day fires.

Email alerts within the MARCUS GPS Fleet Tracking solution gives you control over your fleet with on-demand metrics and instant access. Sixteen different alerts, including speeding, first motion of the day and zone or location violations, are sent via email to ensure you proactively manage your individual vehicles or your entire fleet in real-time. Our GPS fleet management technology gives you the advantage of providing reliable data to your customers, giving you a competitive edge.
